mapper.sql: ar.id, ar.project_key as projectKey, ar.project_name as projectName, ar.report_status as status, ar.snapshot_id as snapshotId, ar.created_at as createdAt, ar.updated_at as updatedAt
mapper.insert: insert into analysis_reports (project_key, project_name, snapshot_id, report_status, report_data, created_at, updated_at) values (#{projectKey}, #{projectName}, #{snapshotId}, #{status}, #{data}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
